Text: @ 'muahahahaha...' (aka - seppmoser55)' - You are a persistent little cur. I will not be responding anymore. I thought you were stupid, but you are worst than that. I leave to the downloaders.
...Promo, what sort of time frame are you working under insofar as posting the other volumes of your collection?
@ 'ChingaTuu' - I am sorry, but I have a running battle with my ISP regarding Bandwidth issue. But I will try to upload as fast as I can :)
...Nyet problema, tovarisch. I've been in that situation before, so I can relate. Either way, I see volume 3 is up, so I'll go download that now. Thanks again for whatever your bandwidth allows, sir!
